00017 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00019 #include "MisrError.h"
00020 #include <hdf.h>
00021 #include <string.h>
00022 
00039 MTKt_status MtkFileBlockMetaFieldList(
00040   const char *filename, 
00041   const char *blockmetaname, 
00042   int *nfields, 
00043   char **fieldlist[]  )
00044 {
00045   MTKt_status status_code;  /* Return status of this function. */
00046   MTKt_status status;      /* Return status */
00047   intn hdfstatus;           /* HDF-EOS return status */
00048   int32 file_id = FAIL;
00049 
00050   /* Check Arguments */
00051   if (filename == NULL)
00052     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00053   
00054   /* Open HDF File */
00055   file_id = HDFopen(filename, DFACC_READ, 0);
00056   if (file_id == FAIL)
00057     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_OPEN_FAILED);
00058 
00059   /* Read list of fields in a block metadata structure */
00060   status = MtkFileBlockMetaFieldListFid(file_id, blockmetaname, 
00061                     nfields, fieldlist);
00062   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00063 
00064   /* Close HDF file */
00065   hdfstatus = HDFclose(file_id);
00066   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00067     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_HDFCLOSE_FAILED);
00068   file_id = FAIL;
00069   
00070   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00071 
00072 ERROR_HANDLE:
00073   if (file_id != FAIL)
00074     HDFclose(file_id);
00075 
00076   return status_code;
00077 }
00078 
00084 MTKt_status MtkFileBlockMetaFieldListFid(
00085   int32 file_id,             
00086   const char *blockmetaname, 
00087   int *nfields, 
00088   char **fieldlist[]  )
00089 {
00090   MTKt_status status_code;  /* Return status of this function. */
00091   intn hdfstatus;           /* HDF-EOS return status */
00092   int32 vdata_ref = FAIL;
00093   int32 vdata_id = FAIL;
00094   int32 num_fields = 0;     /* Number of fields */
00095   char *list = NULL;        /* List of fields */
00096   int i;
00097   char *temp = NULL;
00098   int vstart_active = 0;
00099 
00100   /* Check Arguments */
00101   if (blockmetaname == NULL ||
00102       nfields == NULL || fieldlist == NULL)
00103     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00104   
00105   *fieldlist = NULL;
00106 
00107   /* Initialize the vdata interface */
00108   hdfstatus = Vstart(file_id);
00109   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00110     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VSFIND_FAILED);
00111   vstart_active = 1;
00112   
00113   /* Find reference number of block metadata structure */
00114   vdata_ref = VSfind(file_id, blockmetaname);
00115   if (vdata_ref == 0) /* Failure */
00116     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VSFIND_FAILED);
00117   
00118   vdata_id = VSattach(file_id, vdata_ref, "r");
00119   if (vdata_id == FAIL)
00120     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VSATTACH_FAILED);
00121   
00122   /* Determine number of fields in block metadata structure */
00123   num_fields = VFnfields(vdata_id);
00124   if (num_fields == FAIL)
00125     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VFNFIELDS_FAILED);
00126   
00127   list = (char*)malloc((VSNAMELENMAX + 1) * num_fields * sizeof(char));
00128   if (list == NULL)
00129     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00130 
00131   /* Get list of fields */
00132   hdfstatus = VSgetfields(vdata_id, list);
00133   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00134     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VSGETFIELDS_FAILED);
00135   
00136   *nfields = num_fields;
00137   *fieldlist = (char**)calloc(num_fields,sizeof(char*));
00138   if (*fieldlist == NULL)
00139     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_CALLOC_FAILED);
00140     
00141   temp = strtok(list,",");
00142   i = 0;
00143   while (temp != NULL)
00144   {
00145     (*fieldlist)[i] = (char*)malloc((strlen(temp) + 1) * sizeof(char));
00146     if ((*fieldlist)[i] == NULL)
00147       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00148     strcpy((*fieldlist)[i],temp);
00149     temp = strtok(NULL,",");
00150     ++i;
00151   }
00152 
00153   free(list);
00154   list = NULL;
00155   temp = NULL;
00156   
00157   hdfstatus = VSdetach(vdata_id);
00158   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00159     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VSDETACH_FAILED);
00160 
00161   /* End access to the vdata interface */ 
00162   hdfstatus = Vend(file_id);
00163   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00164     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VEND_FAILED);
00165   vstart_active = 0;
00166     
00167   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00168 
00169 ERROR_HANDLE:
00170   if (vdata_id != FAIL)
00171     VSdetach(vdata_id);
00172 
00173   if (vstart_active)
00174     Vend(file_id);
00175 
00176   free(list);
00177 
00178   if (fieldlist != NULL && *fieldlist != NULL)
00179     MtkStringListFree(num_fields,&*fieldlist);
00180 
00181   return status_code;
00182 }
